data.comment: The big names in today's match at Bravida Arena have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Andreas Ekberg, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 3, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
Joona Toivio (Hacken) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Andreas Ekberg signals a throw-in for Goteborg, close to Hacken's area.
Andreas Ekberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Hacken.
In the minute 8, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Hacken just outside Goteborg's area.
Godswill Ekpolo of Hacken gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hacken are coming forward and Daleho Irandust gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
Free kick Goteborg.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Free kick in a good position for Goteborg!
In Gothenburg Goteborg drive forward through Giorgi Kharaishvili. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
The match at Bravida Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sargon Abraham, who is down injured.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Sargon Abraham has recovered and rejoins the match in Gothenburg.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Goteborg at Bravida Arena.
Leo Bengtsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hacken.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Hacken's Jasse Tuominen is on target but unsuccessful.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Goteborg's Victor Wernersson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hacken defender.
In the minute 30, Goteborg drives forward and Giorgi Kharaishvili gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Andreas Ekberg signals a Hacken throw-in in Goteborg's half.
Free kick for Goteborg in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 32, Rasmus Lindgren is booked for the home team.
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
Throw-in Hacken.
In the minute 35, Goteborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leo Bengtsson of Hacken smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goteborg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hacken.
In the minute 36, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Important block from the Hacken defence as Giorgi Kharaishvili fires in a strike for Goteborg.
Can Goteborg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 40, Andreas Ekberg awards Hacken a goal kick.
Jasse Tuominen (Hacken) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Hacken in their own half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hacken push forward at Bravida Arena and Gustav Berggren gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goteborg defence.
In the minute 43, In Gothenburg Goteborg attack through Sargon Abraham. The finish is off target, however.
Andreas Ekberg awards Hacken a goal kick.
Leonard Zuta for Hacken gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 43, Goteborg have a goal kick.
Throw-in Goteborg.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Goteborg.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Goteborg.
Goteborg's Giorgi Kharaishvili looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Hacken's Jasse Tuominen gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Goteborg at Bravida Arena.
The first-half has come to a close in Gothenburg.
In the minute 45, Giorgi Kharaishvili is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 45, August Erlingmark (Goteborg) gets a yellow card.
The second half has started at Bravida Arena.
Free kick Hacken.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Goteborg.
In the minute 46, Tobias Sana is on a sub for Giorgi Kharaishvili for Goteborg.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Hacken.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in high up the field for Goteborg in Gothenburg.
Goteborg to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
In the minute 55, Hacken's Joona Toivio breaks free at Bravida Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
Andreas Alm is making the team's second substitution at Bravida Arena with Ahmed Yasin replacing Jasse Tuominen.
Hacken have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Ali Youssef is replacing Patrik Walemark for the home team.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 59, Erik Friberg (Hacken) strikes at Bravida Arena but his header is cleared.
Andreas Ekberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Hacken.
In the minute 60, Can Goteborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Erik Friberg with Alexander Faltsetas.
Goteborg make their second substitution with Noah Alexandersson replacing Sargon Abraham.
Throw-in for Goteborg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Goteborg at Bravida Arena.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Goteborg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Hacken in their own half.
Goteborg to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Hacken's Daleho Irandust gets in a shot on goal at Bravida Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Ali Youssef (Hacken) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Hacken capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goteborg's half?
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
Hacken are in shooting range from this free kick.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 73, Andreas Ekberg awards Goteborg a goal kick.
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 76, Andreas Ekberg signals a Hacken throw-in in Goteborg's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 77, Kristopher Da Graca is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Goteborg.
Kristopher Da Graca is back on his feet again.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Goteborg in the half of Hacken.
Hacken have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Tobias Sana (Goteborg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Mattias Bjarsmyr (Goteborg) has replaced the possibly injured Kristopher Da Graca.
Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Adam Andersson is replacing Leo Bengtsson for the home team.
In the minute 84, Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 84, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hacken close to the penalty box.
Alhassan Yusuf for Goteborg has been booked by Andreas Ekberg and receives a first yellow card.
Hacken's Adam Andersson is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Hacken.
In the minute 86, Hacken drives forward and Daleho Irandust gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Goteborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Goteborg make their fourth substitution with Emil Holm replacing Alexander Jallow.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Hacken.
That's full-time at Bravida Arena. The final score is 0-0.
Alexander Faltsetas (Hacken) has been shown a straight red card by referee Andreas Ekberg.
